attributes.action: Cut foreign aid and fix Britain ,our child poverty ,flood defences,elderly care.
attributes.additional_details: Example Floods in Kendal uk ,while 1million pounds spent on flood defences in Lazarevac in Serbia £300 million ear marked for the Caribbean for anti flood works .Aid still given to India whilst they spend millions on their space programme ,aid still given to China the second biggest economy in the world ,yet we still have kids in Britian living in poverty .British tax payers money for British people .
attributes.background: We spend Billions on other countries while our own people suffer ,we still give India aid while they spend millions on their space programme ,we still give aid to China the second biggest economy in the world ,£200 million of our foreign aid is due to be spent on anti flood works .Our  Britian .
